item.title: Dall-E aka artificial intelligent painting
item.description: Welcome back to another blog about artificial intelligence. In case you are a new reader you should definately read the previous blog too about chatGPT, the AI chatbot! You can read it here. Where chatGPT is a chatbot, Dall-E is a digital artisan. By giving it a description of which image you want, Dall-E generates a couple of images for you and I must admit that the results are pretty whopping.
